text: The Angus Drive EP is an EP that was released in 2003 by Canadian singer Avril Lavigne and it contains songs that were already released on her 2002 album Let Go. == Song list == # "Sk8er Boi" 3:25 # "Unwanted" 3:42 # "Losing Grip" 3:54 # "Complicated" 4:05 == References == Category:Avril Lavigne albums Category:2003 albums Category:Pop albums Category:Punk albums Category:Rock albums
title: Angus Drive
